name: Unconscious (itch) (Max Interaktiv)
description:
Unconscious is a short horror game set in an unusual hospital that seems to loop around forever. As you try to advance, you become trapped in an endless sequence of identical hallways. Will you manage to break free from the hospital and return to the world of the living, or will you be confined forever in this nightmare?

Gameplay: 10 - 15 min

Graphics: PS1 inspired
